text: The Amrit Bharat Express is an express rail in India. It is a superfast train. It first started running on the 30th December 2023. It is currently used in 2 lines across India. The train was designed to reach a speed of 160 km/h but reached a maximum speed of 130 km/h. It connects cities that are more than 800 km apart. == Reference == https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amrit_Bharat_Express == Other websites == Indian Railways Category:Rail transport in India
title: Amrit Bharat Express
